snippet: The Winston-Salem police say that four white officers are on administrative duty after a black man who was subdued with pepper spray died in custody.
abstract: Winston-Salem, NC, police say four white officers have been put on administrative duty after black prisoner Travis Page died in custody after being subdued with pepper spray.
lead_paragraph: The Winston-Salem police say that four white officers are on administrative duty after a black man who was subdued with pepper spray died in custody.

headline.main: North Carolina: Officers on Leave After Man’s Death in Custody
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Officers on Leave After Man’s Death in Custody
